public-profile.subtitle: In your profile you will be able to see the specified information

manage-account.subtitle: Makes changes to the email address, password, and account type. This information is confidential and will not be in a future public profile.

personal-data.subtitle: Edit basic personal information to improve recommendations. This information is confidential and will not appear on your public profile.
